snippet: BUDICK--Ben. Called to eternal rest. Gail Manning's beloved and loving husband. Brother of Debbie Sheinkopf and Alan Budick. Uncle of Daniel Budick, Isaac Sheinkopf, and Sarah Sheinkopf. Friend to many. He was happy and much loved. Graveside services Tuesday, February 2, 11am, Cedar Park Paramus. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BUDICK--Ben. Called to eternal rest. Gail Manning's beloved and loving husband. Brother of Debbie Sheinkopf and Alan Budick. Uncle of Daniel Budick, Isaac Sheinkopf, and Sarah Sheinkopf. Friend to many. He was happy and much loved. Graveside services Tuesday, February 2, 11am, Cedar Park Paramus. 1/3
